about.title: Our Team
about.intro: Team SEGAROW, at your service to delight you every day !

louis.description: Traumatized by Sonic Heroes and Knuckles' levels in Sonic Adventure 2, Louis is passionate about the supersonic blue hedgehog. He dreams of a new SEGA console and a million subscribers (you know what you have to do).

xela.description: Xela is the "jack of all trades" of our Twitch channel. Minecraft, Rust, chopping wood and building, that's his thing.

azurios.description: Renowned coach, Azurios exceeds a number of hours on Football Manager that you can't even imagine. If you dream of seeing a district club win the Champions League, you can be sure he's the mastermind behind it.

publisher.title: Site Publisher

dataProtection.title: Personal Data & Cookies
dataProtection.description: The Segarow website only collects data necessary for the authentication system to function.
dataProtection.accountData: Account data (username, email, hashed password) is stored securely and is only used for authentication and site features.
dataProtection.cookies: The site uses technical cookies to maintain user sessions and improve browsing experience.
dataProtection.thirdParty: No data is transmitted to third parties for commercial or advertising purposes.
dataProtection.openSource: This site is an open source project. The source code is publicly available under Apache License 2.0 and can be viewed, modified, and distributed by anyone. Find the repository here:

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: All content on the SEGAROW website (texts, images, videos, graphic elements, etc.) is protected by intellectual property law.
intellectualProperty.prohibition: Any reproduction or use without authorization is prohibited.
intellectualProperty.openSource: The source code of this site is available under Apache License 2.0 and can be freely used, modified, and distributed. However, editorial content (articles, reviews, comments) remains the property of their respective authors.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For any questions regarding this legal notice, you can contact us at:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: Using the SEGAROW website implies full and complete acceptance of these terms of service.

access.title: Site Access
access.description: The site is freely accessible to any user with internet access.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.description: The site offers an authentication system allowing users to:

features.2: Post comments on articles and reviews
features.4: Access a personal space to manage their data

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.description: SEGAROW reserves the right to modify the content or access to the site at any time, without notice.

content.title: Content and Availability
content.description: The site offers articles, video game reviews, and a commenting system.
content.accuracy: No guarantee is given regarding the availability or accuracy of content, although everything is done to ensure reliable service.

rules.1: Respect other users and not post offensive content
rules.2: Not use the site for commercial or advertising purposes
rules.3: Not attempt to compromise site security

liability.title: Liability
liability.description: SEGAROW cannot be held responsible for content published by users. Each user is responsible for their own publications.
